name: Suzune Robot
description: A Powerful Telegram group management bot with anime theme.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token. Get one from @BotFather duh

API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based source.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based source.

SESSION_STRING.description: Your user ID as an integer.

SUDO_USERS_ID.description: Your Heroku API key, get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account'

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Enter the Heroku app name here (Must an exact same name with your input above).

MESSAGE_DUMP_CHAT.description: Your Telegram support group chat username where your users will go and bother you with shit But be like: MyGroupChatUsernameBlah. If this ever points to masha support than consider you made an enemy.

MONGO_URL.description: Event logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. ex: '-123456'

ARQ_API_URL.description: A channel where bot will print who added it to what group, useful during debugging or spam handling.

ARQ_API_KEY.description: Required for currency converter. Get yours from https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key

LOG_MENTIONS.description: Required for timezone information. Get yours from https://timezonedb.com/api

PM_PERMIT.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bot (can use /py etc.). If you are a noob and would come and bother Masha support then keep the current ID's here at they are and add yours.
